name: avocado toast
steps: Toast the bread. Mash the avocado with salt, pepper, olive oil, and lemon juice. Spread on the toast and serve.

name: banana smoothie
steps: Blend banana, milk, and honey until smooth.

name: grilled chicken salad
steps: Grill the chicken, chop the vegetables, mix everything, and drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: lemon cake
steps: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C) and grease a pan. Mix flour, baking powder, and salt. Beat butter and sugar until fluffy, then add eggs. Stir in lemon juice, zest, vanilla, and milk. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients. Pour the batter into the pan and bake for 30-35 minutes. Let it cool.

name: chocolate chip cookies
steps: Mix all ingredients, form small cookie dough balls, and bake at 350째F (175째C) for 10-12 minutes.

name: strawberry pancakes
steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, eggs, and milk. Cook pancakes on a pan. Serve with butter and strawberries.
